stories.Title: Nvidia’s latest work of art
stories.Description: Derived from Instant NeRF, the company's Neuralangelo captures every detail from 2D clips and converts it into stunning 3D versions, just like Michelangelo in the Renaissance.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia’s latest work of art 📦 Derived from Instant NeRF, the company's Neuralangelo captures every detail from 2D clips and converts it into stunning 3D versions, just like Michelangelo in the Renaissance. #nvidia https://www.techtimes.com/articles/292163/20230601/nvidias-ai-model-neuralangelo-instantly-turn-2d-videos-3d-models.htm

stories.Title: OpenAI’s $1M initiative
stories.Description: Their grant program is seeking innovative projects that leverage generative AI to enhance defense, measure AI model security, and address evolving threats.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI’s $1M initiative 📦 Their grant program is seeking innovative projects that leverage generative AI to enhance defense, measure AI model security, and address evolving threats. #openai https://openai.com/blog/openai-cybersecurity-grant-program

stories.Title: Are you tired of clickbait? Artifact too
stories.Description: The news app created by Instagram co-founders introduces real-time clickbait headline rewrites, powered by OpenAI's GPT-4.
stories.Tweet: Are you tired of clickbait? Artifact too 📦 The news app created by Instagram co-founders introduces real-time clickbait headline rewrites, powered by OpenAI's GPT-4. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/2/23745927/artifact-fix-clickbait-headlines-rewriting-ai

stories.Title: Microsoft signs deal with CoreWeave
stories.Description: Microsoft's quest for AI dominance continues with a significant investment in CoreWeave's cloud computing infrastructure, aimed at fortifying OpenAI's computing capabilities.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft signs deal with CoreWeave 📦 Microsoft's quest for AI dominance continues with a significant investment in CoreWeave's cloud computing infrastructure, aimed at fortifying OpenAI's computing capabilities. #microsoft https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/01/microsoft-inks-deal-with-coreweave-to-meet-openai-cloud-demand.html

stories.Title: Apple keeps looking for AI talent
stories.Description: New job openings reveal the company is actively seeking software engineers with expertise in generative AI and mixed reality.
stories.Tweet: Apple keeps looking for AI talent 📦 New job openings reveal the company is actively seeking software engineers with expertise in generative AI and mixed reality. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/06/01/apple-engineers-generative-ai/

stories.Title: Broadcasting directly from the red planet
stories.Description: The European Space Agency is bringing Mars to our screens with a first-of-its-kind live stream. Witness new images coming in every 50 seconds directly from the Mars Express spacecraft.
stories.Tweet: Broadcasting directly from the red planet 📦 The European Space Agency is bringing Mars to our screens with a first-of-its-kind live stream. Witness new images coming in every 50 seconds directly from the Mars Express spacecraft. #ESA https://petapixel.com/2023/06/01/the-first-ever-live-stream-from-mars-is-happening-this-week/

stories.Title: Apparently… We are alone
stories.Description: NASA's advisory board on UAP convened for their inaugural public meeting, where they highlighted the lack of convincing evidence for extraterrestrial life.
stories.Tweet: Apparently… We are alone 📦 NASA's advisory board on UAP convened for their inaugural public meeting, where they highlighted the lack of convincing evidence for extraterrestrial life. #NASA https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/06/nasa-panel-no-convincing-evidence-for-extraterrestrial-life-connected-with-uaps/

stories.Title: Rocket Lab delays Venus mission
stories.Description: Recently, the team has put off the search for organic molecules in the planet's atmosphere. However, they remain committed to this ambitious journey.
stories.Tweet: Rocket Lab delays Venus mission 📦 Recently, the team has put off the search for organic molecules in the planet's atmosphere. However, they remain committed to this ambitious journey. #rocketlab https://www.engadget.com/rocket-lab-delays-its-venus-atmospheric-probe-mission-090847239.html

stories.Title: Starliner is not ready yet
stories.Description: Boeing and NASA announced a delay in the first crewed flight test of the Starline due to technical challenges. Issues with parachute systems and flammable tape require attention and resolution.
stories.Tweet: Starliner is not ready yet 📦 Boeing and NASA announced a delay in the first crewed flight test of the Starline due to technical challenges. Issues with parachute systems and flammable tape require attention and resolution. #NASA https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/01/nasa-boeing-delay-the-first-crewed-flight-test-of-the-starliner-capsuleagain/

stories.Title: Dream Chaser is getting closer to its goal
stories.Description: Sierra Space's spaceplane has undergone a significant test, with its systems successfully powered up for the very first time. Bringing us closer to its inaugural flight.
stories.Tweet: Dream Chaser is getting closer to its goal 📦 Sierra Space's spaceplane has undergone a significant test, with its systems successfully powered up for the very first time. Bringing us closer to its inaugural flight. #sierraspace https://spacenews.com/dream-chaser-moves-a-step-closer-to-first-launch/

stories.Title: A classic revamped
stories.Description: VW's ID Buzz electric microbus is coming to North America with more power, larger battery capacity, and extra seating.
stories.Tweet: A classic revamped 📦 VW's ID Buzz electric microbus is coming to North America with more power, larger battery capacity, and extra seating. #VW https://electrek.co/2022/09/07/vw-id-buzz-test-drive-ev-character-utility/

title: Nvidia’s own Michelangelo, OpenAI’s grant program, Apple’s hunt for AI talent continues
